SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core.builder

Class Eip4844Builder

java.lang.Object
sh.brane.core.builder.Eip4844Builder
public final class Eip4844Builder extends Object
Builder for EIP-4844 blob transactions.

EIP-4844 transactions carry blob data in a sidecar for data availability. They use EIP-1559 style gas pricing plus an additional maxFeePerBlobGas field for blob-specific gas pricing.

Blob data can be provided in two mutually exclusive ways:

  • blobData(byte[]) - raw data to be encoded into blobs
  • sidecar(BlobSidecar) - pre-constructed sidecar with blobs, commitments, and proofs

Example with raw data: 


 BlobTransactionRequest tx = Eip4844Builder.create()
     .from(sender)
     .to(recipient)
     .blobData(rawBytes)
     .maxFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(100))
     .maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(2))
     .maxFeePerBlobGas(Wei.gwei(10))
     .build(kzg);

Example with pre-built sidecar: 


 BlobTransactionRequest tx = Eip4844Builder.create()
     .from(sender)
     .to(recipient)
     .sidecar(preBuiltSidecar)
     .maxFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(100))
     .maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei.gwei(2))
     .maxFeePerBlobGas(Wei.gwei(10))
     .build();

Thread Safety: This builder is not thread-safe. Each thread should use its own builder instance. The build() and build(sh.brane.core.crypto.Kzg) methods create an immutable BlobTransactionRequest that is safe to share across threads.

Since:
0.2.0

      Returns:

    • to

      public Eip4844Builder to(Address address)
      Sets the recipient address.

      Note: EIP-4844 transactions cannot be used for contract creation, so a recipient address is required.

      Parameters:
      address - the recipient address (required, cannot be null)
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • maxFeePerGas

      public Eip4844Builder maxFeePerGas(Wei maxFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum total fee per gas unit.

      This is the absolute maximum the sender is willing to pay per gas unit, including both the base fee and priority fee.

      Parameters:
      maxFeePerGas - the maximum fee per gas
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • maxPriorityFeePerGas

      public Eip4844Builder maxPriorityFeePerGas(Wei maxPriorityFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum priority fee (tip) per gas unit.

      This is the tip paid directly to validators to incentivize inclusion of the transaction.

      Parameters:
      maxPriorityFeePerGas - the maximum priority fee per gas
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • maxFeePerBlobGas

      public Eip4844Builder maxFeePerBlobGas(Wei maxFeePerBlobGas)
      Sets the maximum fee per blob gas unit.

      This is the maximum the sender is willing to pay per unit of blob gas. Blob gas is priced independently from execution gas using its own EIP-1559 style fee market.

      Parameters:
      maxFeePerBlobGas - the maximum fee per blob gas
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • accessList

      public Eip4844Builder accessList(List<AccessListEntry> accessList)
      Sets the EIP-2930 access list for gas optimization.

      Access lists pre-declare which accounts and storage slots will be accessed, reducing gas costs for those accesses.

      Parameters:
      accessList - the list of access list entries, or null for no access list
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

    • blobData

      public Eip4844Builder blobData(byte[] blobData)
      Sets raw data to be encoded into blobs.

      The data will be encoded into blobs when build(sh.brane.core.crypto.Kzg) is called. This method is mutually exclusive with sidecar(BlobSidecar).

      Parameters:
      blobData - the raw data to encode into blobs
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining
      Throws:
      BraneTxBuilderException - if a sidecar has already been set

    • sidecar

      public Eip4844Builder sidecar(BlobSidecar sidecar)
      Sets a pre-constructed blob sidecar.

      Use this method when you have already constructed a BlobSidecar with blobs, commitments, and proofs. This method is mutually exclusive with blobData(byte[]).

      Parameters:
      sidecar - the pre-constructed blob sidecar
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining
      Throws:
      BraneTxBuilderException - if blobData has already been set

    • build

      public BlobTransactionRequest build(Kzg kzg)
      Builds the blob transaction request using raw blob data.

      This method requires that blobData(byte[]) was called to provide raw data. The data will be encoded into blobs and a sidecar will be constructed using the provided KZG implementation.

      Parameters:
      kzg - the KZG implementation for computing commitments and proofs
      Returns:
      the constructed blob transaction request
      Throws:
      BraneTxBuilderException - if required fields are missing or invalid
      NullPointerException - if kzg is null

    • build

      public BlobTransactionRequest build()
      Builds the blob transaction request using a pre-constructed sidecar.

      This method requires that sidecar(BlobSidecar) was called to provide a pre-constructed sidecar.

      Returns:
      the constructed blob transaction request
      Throws:
      BraneTxBuilderException - if required fields are missing or invalid
